query: CREATE OPERATOR ## ( leftarg = path, rightarg = path, function = path_inter, commutator = ## )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR ## (leftarg = path, rightarg = path, function = path_inter, commutator = '##')

query: CREATE OPERATOR @#@ ( rightarg = int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR @#@ (rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: CREATE OPERATOR #%# ( leftarg = int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #%# (leftarg = BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: SELECT @#@ 24
expected: SELECT @#@24

query: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ###### (NONE, int4) IS 'bad prefix'
expected: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ######(NONE, INT) IS 'bad prefix'

query: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ###### (int4, NONE) IS 'bad postfix'
expected: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ######(INT, NONE) IS 'bad postfix'

query: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ###### (int4, int8) IS 'bad infix'
expected: COMMENT ON OPERATOR ######(INT, BIGINT) IS 'bad infix'

query: DROP OPERATOR ###### (NONE, int4)
expected: DROP OPERATOR ######(NONE, INT)

query: DROP OPERATOR ###### (int4, NONE)
expected: DROP OPERATOR ######(INT, NONE)

query: DROP OPERATOR ###### (int4, int8)
expected: DROP OPERATOR ######(INT, BIGINT)

query: CREATE OPERATOR => ( rightarg = int8, procedure = factorial )
error: parse error at position 18: syntax error

query: CREATE OPERATOR !=- ( rightarg = int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR !=- (rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: SELECT !=- 10
expected: SELECT !=-10

query: SELECT 10 !=-
error: parse error at position 13: syntax error

expected: SELECT 2 <> 1, 2 <> 2

query: SELECT 2 != 1
expected: SELECT 2 <> 1

query: DO $$ declare r boolean; begin execute $e$ select 2 != 1 $e$ into r; raise info 'r = %', r; end;$$;
expected: DO ' declare r boolean; begin execute $e$ select 2 != 1 $e$ into r; raise info ''r = %'', r; end;'

query: SELECT true<>-1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1
expected: SELECT TRUE <>- 1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1

query: SELECT false<>/**/1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1
expected: SELECT FALSE <> 1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1

query: SELECT false<=-1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1
expected: SELECT FALSE <=- 1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1

query: SELECT false>=-1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1
expected: SELECT FALSE >=- 1 BETWEEN 1 AND 1

query: BEGIN TRANSACTION
expected: BEGIN

query: CREATE ROLE regress_rol_op1
CREATE SCHEMA schema_op1
GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA schema_op1 TO PUBLIC
REVOKE USAGE ON SCHEMA schema_op1 FROM regress_rol_op1
SET ROLE regress_rol_op1
expected: SET ROLE 'regress_rol_op1'

query: CREATE OPERATOR schema_op1.#*# ( rightarg = int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR schema_op1.#*# (rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: ROLLBACK
CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( leftarg = SETOF int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (leftarg = SETOF BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( rightarg = SETOF int8, procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (rightarg = SETOF BIGINT, procedure = factorial)

query: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION fn_op2(boolean, boolean) RETURNS boolean AS $$ SELECT NULL::BOOLEAN $$ LANGUAGE sql IMMUTABLE
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION fn_op2 (BOOLEAN, BOOLEAN) RETURNS BOOLEAN AS $$ SELECT NULL::BOOLEAN $$ LANGUAGE sql IMMUTABLE

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( LEFTARG = boolean, RIGHTARG = boolean, PROCEDURE = fn_op2, COMMUTATOR = ===, NEGATOR = !==, RESTRICT = contsel, JOIN = contjoinsel, SORT1, SORT2, LTCMP, GTCMP, HASHES, MERGES )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (leftarg = BOOLEAN, rightarg = BOOLEAN, procedure = fn_op2, commutator = '===', negator = '!==', restrict = contsel, "join" = contjoinsel, sort1, sort2, ltcmp, gtcmp, hashes, merges)

query: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# ( rightarg = int8, procedure = factorial, invalid_att = int8 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# (rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = factorial, invalid_att = BIGINT)

query: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# ( procedure = factorial )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# (procedure = factorial)

query: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# ( rightarg = int8 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #@%# (rightarg = BIGINT)

query: CREATE ROLE regress_rol_op3
CREATE TYPE type_op3 AS ENUM ('new', 'open', 'closed')
CREATE FUNCTION fn_op3(type_op3, int8) RETURNS int8 AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION fn_op3 (type_op3, BIGINT) RETURNS BIGINT AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$

query: REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op3 FROM regress_rol_op3
REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op3 FROM PUBLIC
SET ROLE regress_rol_op3
expected: SET ROLE 'regress_rol_op3'

query: CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( leftarg = type_op3, rightarg = int8, procedure = fn_op3 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (leftarg = type_op3, rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = fn_op3)

query: CREATE ROLE regress_rol_op4
CREATE TYPE type_op4 AS ENUM ('new', 'open', 'closed')
CREATE FUNCTION fn_op4(int8, type_op4) RETURNS int8 AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION fn_op4 (BIGINT, type_op4) RETURNS BIGINT AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$

query: REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op4 FROM regress_rol_op4
REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op4 FROM PUBLIC
SET ROLE regress_rol_op4
expected: SET ROLE 'regress_rol_op4'

query: CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( leftarg = int8, rightarg = type_op4, procedure = fn_op4 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = type_op4, procedure = fn_op4)

query: CREATE ROLE regress_rol_op5
CREATE TYPE type_op5 AS ENUM ('new', 'open', 'closed')
CREATE FUNCTION fn_op5(int8, int8) RETURNS int8 AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION fn_op5 (BIGINT, BIGINT) RETURNS BIGINT AS $$ SELECT NULL::int8 $$

query: REVOKE EXECUTE ON FUNCTION fn_op5(int8, int8) FROM regress_rol_op5
expected: REVOKE EXECUTE ON FUNCTION fn_op5(BIGINT, BIGINT) FROM regress_rol_op5

query: REVOKE EXECUTE ON FUNCTION fn_op5(int8, int8) FROM PUBLIC
expected: REVOKE EXECUTE ON FUNCTION fn_op5(BIGINT, BIGINT) FROM PUBLIC

query: SET ROLE regress_rol_op5
expected: SET ROLE 'regress_rol_op5'

query: CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( leftarg = int8, rightarg = int8, procedure = fn_op5 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = fn_op5)

query: CREATE ROLE regress_rol_op6
CREATE TYPE type_op6 AS ENUM ('new', 'open', 'closed')
CREATE FUNCTION fn_op6(int8, int8) RETURNS type_op6 AS $$ SELECT NULL::type_op6 $$
expected: CREATE FUNCTION fn_op6 (BIGINT, BIGINT) RETURNS type_op6 AS $$ SELECT NULL::type_op6 $$

query: REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op6 FROM regress_rol_op6
REVOKE USAGE ON TYPE type_op6 FROM PUBLIC
SET ROLE regress_rol_op6
expected: SET ROLE 'regress_rol_op6'

query: CREATE OPERATOR #*# ( leftarg = int8, rightarg = int8, procedure = fn_op6 )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR #*# (leftarg = BIGINT, rightarg = BIGINT, procedure = fn_op6)

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( leftarg = integer, rightarg = integer, procedure = int4eq, negator = === )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (leftarg = INT, rightarg = INT, procedure = int4eq, negator = '===')

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( leftarg = integer, rightarg = integer, procedure = int4eq, commutator = ===!!! )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (leftarg = INT, rightarg = INT, procedure = int4eq, commutator = '===!!!')

query: CREATE OPERATOR ===!!! ( leftarg = integer, rightarg = integer, procedure = int4ne, negator = ===!!! )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR ===!!! (leftarg = INT, rightarg = INT, procedure = int4ne, negator = '===!!!')

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( leftarg = integer, rightarg = integer, procedure = int4eq, commutator = = )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (leftarg = INT, rightarg = INT, procedure = int4eq, commutator = '=')

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( leftarg = integer, rightarg = integer, procedure = int4eq, negator = <> )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === (leftarg = INT, rightarg = INT, procedure = int4eq, negator = '<>')

query: CREATE OPERATOR === ( "Leftarg" = box, "Rightarg" = box, "Procedure" = area_equal_function, "Commutator" = ===, "Negator" = !==, "Restrict" = area_restriction_function, "Join" = area_join_function, "Hashes", "Merges" )
expected: CREATE OPERATOR === ("Leftarg" = box, "Rightarg" = box, "Procedure" = area_equal_function, "Commutator" = '===', "Negator" = '!==', "Restrict" = area_restriction_function, "Join" = area_join_function, "Hashes", "Merges")
